info.title: MapmyIndia Explore APIs
info.description:
Security Type

This APIs follow OAuth2 based security. To know more on how to create your authorization tokens, please click the `Authorize` button below. More details available here

  • Login/Sing Up for API key and other access.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about MapmyIndia APIs

get.description: This API gives the general details of that particular place id (eLoc) with keyinfo.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting of results by date ascending or descending.

alt.description: Altitude of the user’s location, in meters.

altAcc.description: Vertical accuracy of the user’s location, in meters.

broadcast.description: Who to broadcast this review. Accepts a comma-separated list of values (public, private, followers, followings). If no valid value is found, the default is public.

placeName.description: Name of the place or event.

platform.description:
Platfrom from which request is being made.
Allowed values- 101(Android), 104(IOS), 111(ExploreWeb), 112(MapWeb), 121(Traffic)

rating.description:
Rating assigned by user.
Allowed values- 1, 2, 3, 4, 5

broadcast.description: Who to broadcast this review. Accepts a comma-separated list of values (public, private, followers, followings). If no valid value is found, the default is public.

rating.description:
Rating assigned by user.
Allowed values- 1, 2, 3, 4, 5

description.description:
A message about your event.
Size range- 10..250

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting of results by date ascending or descending.

delete.description: This API allows you to delete an existing report.

get.description: This API allows you to get counts of all activity done by all Users.

post.description: This API allows you to upload files of different media type on a place or pin.

type.description:
Type on which assets are uploaded( place or pin) .
Allowed values- place, report, review, atlas, comment, claim, respond, enquiry

pinId.description: Id of the pin(report,review,atlas,comment,claim,respond,enquiry) on which assets are uploaded. Optional if type = place, otherwise mandatory.

platform.description:
Platfrom from which request is being made.
Allowed values- 101(Android), 104(IOS), 111(ExploreWeb), 112(MapWeb), 121(Traffic)

files[].description:
Files attached by the user. To upload Multiple files use 'files' parameter as, files[0]='file1', files[1]='file2' ... (Max File Size is 6MB)
Allowed values- Image(.jpg, .jpeg, .png, .gif), Video(.mp4, .3gp, .avi), Audio(.mp3, .wav, .wave, .ogg, .mpeg), Documents(.pdf, .csv, .txt, .plain, .docx).

get.description: This API allows you to get all contributions of a user.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: userName of the user to be followed.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: ","(Comma) separated id of Categories OR null in case of all categories requried.

get.description: This API allows you to get counts of all activity done by a user.
This API allows you to get all followers of a user.
This API allows you to get all followings of a user.

post.description: This API allows to flag any pins.

Allowed values- 101(Android), 104(IOS), 111(ExploreWeb), 112(MapWeb), 121(Traffic)

post.description: This API allows to follow any user.

parameters.name: followRequest
parameters.description: user can request follow the user name.

followTo.description: userName of the user to be followed

platform.description:
Platfrom from which request is being made.
Allowed values- 101(Android), 104(IOS), 111(ExploreWeb), 112(MapWeb), 121(Traffic)

post.description: This API allows to like/unlike any pins.

Allowed values: 101(Android), 104(IOS), 111(ExploreWeb), 112(MapWeb), 121(Traffic)

post.description: This API allows set any place as office.

placeName.example: Mapmyindia Head Office New Delhi, 237, Okhla Industrial Estate Phase 3, Near Modi Mill, New Delhi, Delhi, 110020

delete.description: This API allows you to unfollow any user from following list.

placeName.example: Okhla Industrial Estate Phase 3, New Delhi, Delhi. 17 m from MapmyIndia Head Office New Delhi pin-110020
Indianotion Communications 43 Appareddipalya Indiranagar Bengaluru Karnataka

description.example: Add New POI Unique Wheel Alignment Centre - Multi Brand Car Service Station.
Please check this poi name. Dr Sandip Guptqa. Its spell mistake. It should be Gupa not Guptqa.

placeType.description: Type of the place. Allowed values: 0(Residential), 1(Non-Residential)

placeCatCode.description: Hyphon separated Category and Sub-category Code of the place. e.g.: RESLCS-LCSAPT OR RESLCS.

address.example: Netaji Subhash Road, Chandni Chowk, New Delhi, Delhi, 110006
address.description: Address of the place to add.

village.description: Village name of the place (For Rural Areas).

locality.description: Locality name of the place (For Urban Areas).

city.description: City name of the place (For Urban Areas).

district.description: District name of the place (For Rular Areas).

nearestLandmark.example: Lal Qila Metro Station Gate No.- 1

phone.description: Phone number if any of the place.

email.description: Email if any of the place.

website.description: Website if any of the place.

openingHours.description: List of days of opening hours object.

specificInterval.example: null, //0-Open Always, 1-During Day, 2-During Night, null-if days info provided

specialOpeningHours.description: List of days of special opening hours object.

customFields.description: List of key value pairs of used added input.

description.description: A short description about the place. Size range: 10..250

paymentMode.description: Payment modes accepted for the place.

cuisines.description: List of Cusines available at the place.

platform.description: Platfrom from which request is being made. Allowed values: 101(Android), 104(IOS), 111(ExploreWeb), 112(MapWeb), 121(Traffic)
